text: Morning Jane, just wanted to let you know that Mark and Lisa are out with the flu. We'll need to adjust the schedule accordingly.
Can you believe Tommy is turning 5 next week? We should start planning his birthday party!
I've received the art supplies invoice from Creative Kids. Should I file it under this month's expenses?
Reminder: Staff meeting tomorrow at 10 AM. We'll discuss the new hygiene protocols to prevent the spread of flu.
Jane, the parents appreciated the notice about the flu cases. Thanks for handling the communication so well.
Hey, I've scheduled a deep clean for the center this weekend to ensure we're taking all precautions against the flu.
